bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLII (Nos 2999-3087)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Parsons P.J., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLII (Nos 2999-3087). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 58.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1974, 8°, xvi-204 pp. et XII pll.

C.R. par Alan K. Bowman, CR N.S., 27 (1977) pp. 87-88. - Quintino Cataudella, C&S 14 (1975) pp. 41-48. - Jean Irigoin, REG 87 (1974) pp. 484-485. - Paul Mertens, BibO 36 (1979) pp. 177-180. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 55 (1975) pp. 291-303 (concerne aussi les volumes XXXVIII, XXXIX, XL et XLI). - James H. Oliver, AJP 96 (1975) pp. 229-231. - Rosario Pintaudi, Prometheus 1 (1975) pp. 284-285. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 52 (1977) No. 103, pp. 167-176. - Anna Swiderek, JJurP 19 (1983) pp. 169-179 (C.R. collectif). - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 26 (1975) pp. 182-194. - Hans Julius Wolff, Zsav 92 (1975) pp. 272-276.
